uses: Using a fork as a makeshift hair pick or comb for unruly hair.
Turning a fork into a unique piece of jewelry by attaching beads or charms to the tines.
Using a fork as a stencil for creating decorative patterns on paper or fabric.
Using a fork as a gardening tool to loosen soil or plant small seeds.
Creating a miniature easel by bending the tines of a fork to hold a small piece of artwork or photo.
Using a fork as a tool for creating textured patterns in clay or playdough.
Using a fork as a bookmark by slipping it between the pages of a book.
Using a fork as a tool for cleaning hard-to-reach spaces, such as in between keyboard keys or small crevices.
Using a fork as a back scratcher for those hard-to-reach spots.
Using a fork as a tool for shaping and styling food for presentation, such as creating decorative swirls in mashed potatoes or cutting perfect slices of cake.
